coded_answer.p: I am writing this letter to let you know my decision aboutin reply to your letter, which I have received recently. I would like to thank you for the competition which was organised by your agency and I must say that I was very surprised when I received the result of the competition.

I think, I could have ana holiday justonly in July because I will have been working infor my previous company for one year by the end of the June and I will have a one monthone-month holiday period from my company. I would rather prefer to stay in thea tent than to staystay in the log cabin because thea tent is more enjoyable.

I might say that I am really good at swimming and saillingsailing because I have been joiningdoing these kinds of activities for five yearyears and I hadhave had a really good training aboutin sea-sportswater sports.
Should I take my clothes with me or are they arrangedprovided in the camp placement? Also, how much does it cost.?
I am looking forward to hearhearing from you.

I hope you and all your family are well and everything is okOK. I'd like to tell you about whatthe exciting experience I had last month during a pop concert. I wish you werehad been there and sawseen the concert, it was really brilliant.

As you know, I'd never been to any activities likeas to be a valunteervolunteer before. The concert tickets were very expensive and I'd seen an adversitementadvertisement on the tvTV. It said, "beBe a valunteervolunteer forat our concert and get a free ticket".." After that I applied and they accepted my application.

You should have seen it, there was a really terrible rush before the concert and everybody was runingrunning around to dodoing something. I helped to carry huge speakers to the concert venue. ThanThen I was told to stay in front of the entrance door and check the tickets. Some people tried to enter without anya ticket but they weren't allowed by the police.
Finally, I helped them, and in return I had a good experience as well as enjoyedenjoying listening to the music.
